content.rendered:
Directed by Maneesh Sharma.

Written by Habib Faisal. Habib Faisal. Sharat Katariya. Guru Thakur.

Cast Shah Rukh Khan(Gaurav Chandna / Aryan Khanna). Shriya Pilgaonkar(Neha). Sayani Gupta(Aryan Khanna’s Legal Advisor). Waluscha D’Souza(Aryan Khanna’s Wife (as Waluscha De Sousa)). Deepika Amin(Gaurav’s mother). Yogendra Tikku(Gaurav’s Father). Taher Shabbir(Sid Kapoor). Farah Ahmed(Red Carpet Guest / Screaming Tourist). Imtiaz Ahmed(Abru). Usman Akram(Reporter). Manoj Anand(Red Carpet Guest / Paparazzi Photographer). Anushka Arora(Red Carpet Guest / Reporter). Robert-Anthony Artlett(Train Station Passenger). Niranjan Asrani(Indian Police Commissioner). Mohit Bagri(Dhruv Khanna). Helen Banks(Commuter). Richard Banks(Police Officer). Kishore Bhatt(Red Carpet Guest / Paparazzi Photographer). Paul Blackwell(Police Officer). Connor Williams(Tim). Tatiana Natalia Carpenter(Rich Guest (as Tatiana Zarubova)). Randeep Chana(Red Carpet Guest / Paparazzi Photographer). Zachary Coffin(Jail Inmate). Bianca Colaco(Isha Khanna). Eva Crankson(V. I. P. Guest).

Language Hindi.

Producers Padam Bhushan. Aditya Chopra. Boris Dmitrovic. Chris Martin. Bharat Rawail. Aashish Singh. Gurpreet Singh. Navmeet Singh.

Production Yash Raj Films.
